plot: A saloon is pressured to close down by the ladies of the local temperance society, and a soda shop is opened up instead. The local men get their revenge by hiring the prettiest young women they can find to work there. Complications ensue.
title: Water, Water, Everywhere
plot_es: A saloon is pressured to close down by the ladies of the local temperance society, and a soda shop is opened up instead. The local men get their revenge by hiring the prettiest young women they can find to work there. Complications ensue.
plot_en: A saloon is pressured to close down by the ladies of the local temperance society, and a soda shop is opened up instead. The local men get their revenge by hiring the prettiest young women they can find to work there. Complications ensue.
